summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 11V574000 (WHEELS). THE CONTACT TOOK THE VEHICLE TO BE INSPECTED AND WAS INFORMED THAT THE LUG NUTS WERE DEFECTIVE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO FORD WEST LEST HERR (10 CAMPBELL BLVD, GETZVILLE, NY 14068, 716-698-5464). THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED DUE TO COST. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 65,049.
